text: Gerald "Gerry" Paul Lindgren (born March 9, 1946) is an American track and field runner. He set many long-standing high school and national records in the United States. In 1965, Lindgren and Billy Mills both broke the world record for the six-mile run when they finished in an extremely rare tie at the AAU National Championships, both running exactly 27:11.6.Statistics â€“ USA Outdoor Track & Field Champions . title: Gerry Lindgren
